verbose_text: Recently, we demonstrated that aa 26 to 100 region of intracellular LOX-PP interacts with Hsp70 and c-Raf to promote apoptosis and inhibit motility, potentially via altered mitochondrial function XREF_BIBR.
evidence: aa 26 to 100 region of intracellular LOX-PP interacts with Hsp70 and c-Raf to promote apoptosis
